medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that the pain started about 36 hours ago in the mid abdomen and progressed to the RLQ. He has also experienced intermittent nausea and has not eaten or drunk anything since the onset of symptoms. The pain is described as worse than his post-operative surgical pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CAD, MI s/p stent x2, AAA s/p open repair, Hypertension, Bladder cancer s/p chemo, cystoprostatectomy with neobladder, Alcoholism (quit), Meningioma, Glossopharyngeal neuralgia, Colon cancer, History of small bowel obstruction, Open aortic aneurysm repair, Cardiac stents x2, Cystoprostatectomy with neobladder, Bilateral ureteric stent removal.
medical_history.family_history: CAD grandmother, Brother died at age unknown of unknown intestinal condition, Paternal grandfather: AAA.
